Thailand confident aid effort will lead to Myanmar crisis dialogueA new Thailand-led humanitarian initiative aims to pave the way for talks between warring camps in military-ruled Myanmar, a senior Thai official said, three years after a coup triggered instability and a wave of violence across the country. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 00:03:17 GMT DIODTM4M4RMA7IS2QZIPQTM6HE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-confident-aid-effort-will-lead-myanmar-crisis-dialogue-2024-02-06/Panu Wongcha-Um世界亚太地区
China court's suspended death sentence for Australian writer an 'outrage,' PM saysAustralia Prime Minister Anthony Albanese on Tuesday said it was an "outrage" that a Beijing court handed Australian writer Yang Hengjun a suspended death sentence on espionage charges and vowed to continue to make efforts for his release. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 22:40:49 GMT K3QNTVSJ3NIZRNTM2UA4YW7P7A https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-courts-suspended-death-sentence-australian-writer-an-outrage-pm-says-2024-02-05/Reuters世界亚太地区
US Treasury team heads to China this week to talk subsidies, economic policiesThe Biden administration is sending five senior U.S. Treasury officials to Beijing this week for economic talks that will focus heavily on China's "non-market" policies that are adding excess industrial capacity, a Treasury official said on Monday. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 22:17:22 GMT HSI3M3B5QJMTXJ7HT5XEXBLQ24 https://www.reuters.com/markets/us-treasury-team-heads-china-this-week-talk-subsidies-economic-policies-2024-02-05/David Lawder市场

Stake F1 team swerves gambling restrictions with dual identityThe Sauber-run Stake Formula One team will race under two names this season to comply with gambling restrictions in some countries. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 20:26:31 GMT QEXB5EILMRILNGVNEONVTDAOE https://www.reuters.com/sports/formula1/stake-f1-team-swerves-gambling-restrictions-with-dual-identity-2024-02-05/Alan Baldwin运动的公式1
EU cautions against trade measures to support solar sectorThe European Union needs to take into account its ambitious targets for solar power deployment before it considers any measures to curb imports of photovoltaic panels, wafers and other components, a senior EU official said on Monday. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 19:20:44 GMT F7MQM6O2CBIDBN37TG6NDZ27BM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-cautions-against-trade-measures-support-solar-sector-2024-02-05/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
